code: public void exceptionCaught(IoSession session, Throwable cause) {     cause.printStackTrace().     // Close connection when unexpected exception is caught.     session.closeNow(). }

public void messageReceived(IoSession session, Object message) {     // Reverse reveiced string     String str = message.toString().     StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder(str.length()).     for (int i = str.length() - 1. i >= 0. i--) {         buf.append(str.charAt(i)).     }     if (TestSupport.isPlatform("windows")) {         // seems to be only required on windows to make it work!         buf.append(System.lineSeparator()).     }     // and write it back.     session.write(buf.toString()). }
